forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 3am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. Southeast wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 10am, then showers and thunderstorms between 10am and 5pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. South wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As twilight settles over Boston this evening, the air is turning humid, carrying a whisper of rains yet to come. Currently, the city lies beneath a blanket of clouds, cloaked in the muted glow of urban lights, with the temperature draping itself around a comfortable 56 degrees. A gentle southeast breeze sways lightly through the trees, its strength promising that something more dramatic lurks beyond the horizon. Expect a chance of rain that will likely become more pronounced as the clock ticks towards dawn, with the night hinting at a restless sky.

As we glide into Monday, prepare for a day shrouded in the heavy embrace of clouds, punctuated by a symphony of rain showers and the rumble of distant thunder. The atmosphere will feel charged, the clouds swelling with the anticipation of heavy downpours. Although the highs may flirt with a warm 67 degrees, there’s a likelihood of temperatures gradually retreating as the storm systems roll in. Appropriate attire may include waterproof layers and sturdy footwear, guiding one through puddled streets or sheltered spots—perhaps a cozy café where the world outside softens in the rain. While the broader world may seem dreary, the scent of rain-soaked earth and the chance for thunderous drama provide an invitation for quiet introspection, a reading nook beside a window, or a simple watch as nature orchestrates its own kind of performance.
